_description: How the Apostles made the Creed — five 12-line stanzas

ShrewsS3.First Lines:
Credo Peter began to sayeI believe in god
                    veraye…
ShrewsS3.Last Lines:
…Unto that blys þu us bryngfader and heyven kyngThre
                    persons in trinite
ShrewsS3.Editions:
Calvert,  E. 
             “Extracts from a Fifteenth-Century Manuscript.” 
             Transactions of the Shropshire Archaeological and Natural History
                Society
         2nd. series 6 (1894): 99-106: 102-4.
